text: Hello everyone. I have changed the icon of my module, but this icon is not changed neither in the finder nor in tab. It's a little bit confusing. If we define an icon for this module, it's because we want to identify it everywhere. Is it a "bug" or  is it"wanted"?

Hi all.... a newbie in this HubSpot field. I am making a simple template design for a web page but I am not being able to make the responsive hamburger menu at all. can anyone provide me some guidance or at least can guide me to any resource that may help me out ? Thanks in advance !
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/snippets/responsive/how-to-implement-a-fixed-top-mobile-navigation-design-manager> ?
Thank you, we will look into this issue
thank you!

Hi, newbie here. Wondering if someone can point me to the best place to learn how to get around the design manager, how to extend an existing template with custom modules and CSS, and then how to design your own custom template. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!
Hi. This is the best way: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/get-started-with-the-design-manager>
Thx, Sylvain. I will check it out — it looks like a pretty comprehensive guide.
I will check it out — it looks like a pretty comprehensive guide. Merci. Bonne journée.

We also have a course on our academy that can help you better understand building on the HubSpot CMS: <https://academy.HubSpot.com/lessons/developer-overview-of-the-HubSpot-cms?library=true>

<https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/cms-for-developers?library=true>
Thanks, AJ! Links saved and will check out!
Hooray, I was doing amazing coding yesterday!
Thanks for the French. Bonne journée à toi aussi. :grinning:
Haha - I practice wherever I can.
